threats.title: No authentication system implemented.
threats.mitigation: Should be an authentiction system that will ensure that a user is allowed to interact with the API

threats.title: Person uses somebody else unexpired credentials
threats.mitigation: - Session expiration

threats.title: User uses another users token
threats.mitigation: Token rotation.

threats.title: An attacker can see error messages with security-sensitive content
threats.mitigation: Ensure that detailed information is not included in production.

threats.title: Sensitive information is output on the browser console log.
threats.mitigation: Ensure that console logging is turned off on production.

threats.title: Brute force against API Gateway
threats.mitigation:
- Throttling
- API Gateway DDOS protection enabled.

threats.title: User action is not logged.
threats.mitigation: - Data flows into cloudwatch.

threats.title: Users sends XSS attack against another via Email
threats.mitigation: Sanitization on the email

threats.title: Credentials are stored unencrypted.
threats.mitigation: Any sensitive and credential data should be encrypted.

threats.title: No authentication system implemented
threats.mitigation: Should be an authentiction system that will ensure that a user is allowed to interact with the API

threats.title: An attacker can load python code to execute XSS in the code editor module.
threats.mitigation: Block the evaluation of the javascript.

threats.title: Changes on the egg are not associated with a user on the logs.
Credentials are not encrypted at all
threats.mitigation: Credentials should be encrypted for any connection from the Egg,

threats.title: There is on the database that it´s not encrypted and maybe should be.
threats.mitigation: - Proxy connection

threats.title: There are events on the database that cannot be tracked back an specific user.
threats.mitigation: Should be unique users for each api and human users.

threats.title: Credentials are not encrypted for the DB Access
threats.mitigation: Encrypt sensitive informative

threats.title: Changes to the database are not associated with the user on the logs.
threats.mitigation: Create specific user and be sure that logs are sufficient enough to track any event back.

threats.title: Connection between the egg and the Dataset is not secure.
Someone could modify the terraform script and destroy the system
An unauthorized user gains access to credentials via logs
threats.mitigation: Ensure that masking is enabled for logs.

threats.title: An unthorized user gains access to developers credentials.
threats.mitigation: Multifactor is enabled.

threats.title: Credentials stored in git repo
threats.mitigation:
Reset credentials and change the way that you store them.
Pre commit githook

threats.mitigation: Sanitization should be made here for anything that we are importing to the system.
